title: Understanding the Mapping
text: When mapping your tags, consider the broader context of privacy laws that affect your users and business operations.

hintAnswer: privacy laws that impact your users and businesses rather than just a specific law
title: Identify the Relevant Laws
text: Think about the privacy laws that are most relevant to your users and business, rather than focusing on a single law.
choices: privacy laws that impact your users and businesses rather than just a specific law
